plugin.name: CustomBrowse
plugin.title: Custom Browse
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Browse is available for unlicensed users. If you plan to use this plugin and are running LMS on a NAS or have a large library, please verify that you think the performance is good enough by applying for a free 30-day evaluation license before you purchase a real license.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomClock
plugin.title: Custom Clock Helper (incl. Custom Clock)
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Clock Helper is available for unlicensed users. Custom Clock Helper and Custom Clock uses the same license, so you will always get a license for both when buying one of them.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan
plugin.desc: The LastFM scanning module is available free of charge, the other scanning modules provided by Custom Scan requires a license and isn't available to unlicensed users. If you plan to use this plugin and are running LMS on a NAS or have a large library, please verify that you think the performance is good enough by applying for a free 30-day evaluation license before you purchase a real license.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomSkip
plugin.title: Custom Skip
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Custom Skip is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DatabaseQuery
plugin.title: Database Query
plugin.desc: Currently free of charge but you can make a voluntary payment now to encourage further development
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist (Incl. SQL Playlist)
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Dynamic Playlist is available for unlicensed users. If you pay for Dynamic Playlist you currently get SQL Playlist plugin for free during the same license period.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: MultiLibrary
plugin.title: Multi Library
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in MultiLibrary is available for unlicensed users. If you plan to use this plugin and are running LMS on a NAS or have a large library, please verify that you think the performance is good enough by applying for a free 30-day evaluation license before you purchase a real license.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SQLPlayList
plugin.title: SQL Playlist (Incl. Dynamic Playlist)
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality is available to unlicensed users. If you pay for SQL Playlist you currently get Dynamic Playlist plugin for free during the same license period. If you plan to use this plugin and are running LMS on a NAS or have a large library, please verify that you think the performance is good enough by applying for a free 30-day evaluation license before you purchase a real license.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TitleSwitcher
plugin.title: Title Switcher
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Title Switcher is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.title: TrackStat
plugin.desc: Changing and viewing rating for a single song is currently free of charge but this might change in the future. All possibilities to browse TrackStat data, import/export to iTunes/MusicIP, dynamic playlists and statistic related Custom Skip filters and Custom Browse menus will require a license already now. If you plan to use this plugin and are running LMS on a NAS or have a large library, please verify that you think the performance is good enough by applying for a free 30-day evaluation license before you purchase a real license.
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SugarCube
plugin.title: Spicefly SugarCube
plugin.desc: Requires a license, no functionality in Spicefly SugarCube is available for unlicensed users.
plugin.creator: Charles Parker

plugin.name: CustomLibraries
plugin.title: Custom Libraries
plugin.desc: Free during beta period but might be licensed under same license as Multi Library plugin after beta period has finished
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
